achievements.name: The First Dozen
achievements.desc: Kill 12 enemies

achievements.name: Combo King
achievements.desc: Do 10 combos of 20 hits or more

achievements.name: The Story Ends
achievements.desc: Complete Campaign Mode on Normal difficulty

achievements.name: And the Kitchen Sink
achievements.desc: Find the kitchen sink and kill someone with it

achievements.name: Pistol Heimlich
achievements.desc: Perform 60 Pistol Counter Kills

achievements.name: No Bargains
achievements.desc: Buy nothing for 10 straight waves of Survival

achievements.name: Surf's Up
achievements.desc: Go 15 waves without either player dying in Survival Mode

achievements.name: Freedom Fighter
achievements.desc: Rescue 50 Civilians From The Militia

achievements.name: Shank, SMASH!
achievements.desc: Kill 50 enemies with the heavy object smash

achievements.name: Zombie Killer
achievements.desc: Reach the zombie wave in each Survival map

achievements.name: Gimmick Free
achievements.desc: Kill a Survival Boss with no traps or grenades

achievements.name: Up Close and Personal
achievements.desc: Beat a Campaign level with no ranged attacks

achievements.name: Shopaholic
achievements.desc: Buy everything in Survival Mode

achievements.name: That's Gonna Leave A Mark
achievements.desc: Perform 100 Machete Counter Kills

achievements.name: Too Easy
achievements.desc: Complete Campaign Mode on Hard difficulty

achievements.name: Trigger Happy

achievements.name: Ultimate Survivalist
achievements.desc: Defeat all the waves in any Survival Mode map

achievements.name: Batter Up!
achievements.desc: Execute 150 kills with the baseball bat

achievements.name: Not So Fast...
achievements.desc: Do 30 counters in one Survival match

achievements.name: Ditch Digger
